item.title: 亚马逊竞购 TikTok，美国销售截止日期临近
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，亚马逊公司向白宫提交了一份竞标书，希望从中国所有者手中收购社交视频应用 TikTok。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. submitted a bid to the White House to purchase the social video app TikTok from its Chinese owners, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Invesco 基金经理在特朗普加征关税前做空美元
item.description: 由于预期唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的关税政策将影响美国经济增长，Invesco Ltd.的一位绩优基金经理将看跌美元的押注提高到了几个月来的最高水平。【原文：A top-performing Invesco Ltd. money manager has beefed up her bearish bets against the dollar to the highest level in months on expectations that President Donald Trump’s tariffs will dent US growth.】
